metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19815 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel 5.0.21, mounting a crafted f2fs filesystem image cancause a NULL pointer dereference in f2fs_recover_fsync_data infs/f2fs/recovery.c. This is related to F2FS_P_SB in fs/f2fs/f2fs.h.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
